name: VR - 3D Sports Stadium View
description:
VR - Sports Stadium View 3D will let you a chance to Visit some essential stadium from all over the world VIA you Google Cardboard Vr Glasses. If you are a sports fan and are about to visit a sports stadium for the first time then this is a unique chance to visit in free. An epic visual journey through fine art and cutting edge technology. Get real experience as you desire to explore world famous football hockey cricket and other stadiums. Navigate your device around 360” to explore all in images of stadiums in this game via your Google cardboard Vr glasses. Fully 3d model pictures of stadiums. Its all about you for your by Fun Games art.

How to Play:
Press play Button
Put your device into VR glasses
Use revolving chair or stand in open place
You are free to move forward/backward and left/right just rotating on your axis
Also visualize up/down view

Features:

360 degree rotation
Stunning 3D Graphics
No time Limit, unlimited play and fun
Play it anytime, anywhere!
Various places.
360 images.
Nice graphics.
Reality scene.
